LABEL: 0x33A
STRING: The LCD clock embedded in the wall had a vaguely sea-blue dial.

LABEL: 0x37A
STRING: I checked the time without meaning to.

LABEL: 0x3A2
STRING: We were ushered into our respective rooms after seeing off those who remained on land from the observation deck.

LABEL: 0x400
STRING: Even though the passengers were all sensible people, it was still a challenge for all 50 people to get on board.

LABEL: 0x464
STRING: Even though it wasn't chaotic, I was tired.

LABEL: 0x49E
STRING: Well then...

LABEL: 0x4B4
STRING: I let out a sigh and looked out of the circular window by the desk.

LABEL: 0x577
STRING: Blue sea and blue skies spread out before me.

LABEL: 0x5A7
STRING: It gave off a different impression from inside the submarine than seeing it from land.

LABEL: 0x609
STRING: The sky was an endless blue from just beyond the window frame to the distant horizon.

LABEL: 0x657
STRING: There were big clouds in the distance, typical of the summer sky.

LABEL: 0x6A7
STRING: My view was cut into a circle thanks to the window.

LABEL: 0x6F5
STRING: Round and spherical shapes offered the most pressure resistance.

LABEL: 0x72D
STRING: The outside of the submarine was stylishly designed, but its inner workings were quite simple.

LABEL: 0x797
STRING: It was made up of two large spherical shells joined by a bridge.

LABEL: 0x7FD
STRING: And these windows were not only circular but also extremely thick.

LABEL: 0x841
STRING: If you looked from near the edges, the view distorted as if looking through a pair of strong glasses.

LABEL: 0x895
STRING: There was something romantic about glass that you couldn't see through.

LABEL: 0x90A
STRING: I turned toward the electronic sound.

LABEL: 0x9A1
STRING: 【Welcome to the <SHEEP III>!】

LABEL: 0x9D8
STRING: 【Thank you for coming aboard!】

LABEL: 0xA12
STRING: 【I am POL, the brains of this ship and your assistant.】

LABEL: 0xA64
STRING: 【I hope you don't mind, but I will not be able to appear before you in person.】

LABEL: 0xABA
STRING: A voice, neither male nor female, flowed out of the ceiling speaker.

LABEL: 0xB00
STRING: I would've thought a staff member was talking to me if I didn't know beforehand.

LABEL: 0xB4C
STRING: The reason why this submarine was considered a breakthrough was because it used the latest AI technology for navigation and communication.

LABEL: 0xBBC
STRING: This was their cutting-edge artificial intelligence, POL.

LABEL: 0xBE5
STRING: 【I hope everyone is in their rooms by now.】

LABEL: 0xC1F
STRING: 【The red sections near the door and by the bed are microphones.】

LABEL: 0xC67
STRING: 【These are installed in various places inside the submarine.】

LABEL: 0xCA9
STRING: 【If you need anything from me, you can contact me through them.】

LABEL: 0xCE3
STRING: 【I'll be sure to get back to you as soon as possible, 24 hours a day.】

LABEL: 0xD17
STRING: 【POL is a chatty AI, so even if you don't need anything, feel free to talk to me.】

LABEL: 0xD7A
STRING: 【Whoops, even if I'm a bit of a chatterbox, I'll make sure to keep your secrets.】

LABEL: 0xDCE
STRING: An easygoing AI.

LABEL: 0xDF0
STRING: There was indeed a microphone and what appeared to be a speaker by my bed.

LABEL: 0xE3A
STRING: 【Well then, our attendants will give you a briefing about the <SHEEP III> and the deep sea before we begin the dive in a little less than an hour.】

LABEL: 0xEC0
STRING: 【However, I believe most of our guests today are already familiar with those subjects...】

LABEL: 0xF1A
STRING: 【But I'm sure it'll be less boring than the launch ceremony we just had!】

LABEL: 0xF54
STRING: 【Ladies and gentlemen, please gather in the observation deck on the 3rd floor of the rear section.】

LABEL: 0xF9E
STRING: It was a chatty AI, just like it said.

LABEL: 0xFDA
STRING: Well, less than an hour before the dive starts...

LABEL: 0x100B
STRING: I still had preparations and final checks to make.

LABEL: 0x105F
STRING: Well, no point in rushing too much.

LABEL: 0x108D
STRING: With the time remaining, should I enjoy some sightseeing first?

LABEL: 0x10C5
STRING: 「Yep, let's go!」

LABEL: 0x10E3
STRING: I stood up.

LABEL: 0x1103
STRING: 【Don't forget your keycard.】

LABEL: 0x1188
STRING: ...What a considerate AI.

LABEL: 0x1234
STRING: When you thought of a submarine, you thought of cramped spaces, but the <SHEEP III> was about the size of four university server rooms.

LABEL: 0x12AF
STRING: The <SHEEP III> had a theatre room, a library, and other intriguing facilities, but the observation deck was undoubtedly the main attraction.

LABEL: 0x1332
STRING: A floor in the rear section had been cut through to create a space where all the passengers could gather without feeling cramped.

LABEL: 0x138E
STRING: The wall, curved along the spherical exterior, was almost half covered by large methacrylate windows, which offered a view of the outside from anywhere on the deck.

LABEL: 0x1412
STRING: Like this, one could enjoy the deep sea all around them during the dive.

LABEL: 0x144E
STRING: 「Oops!」

LABEL: 0x1466
STRING: 「Sorry!」

LABEL: 0x147E
STRING: Suddenly, I bumped shoulders with someone.

LABEL: 0x14A0
STRING: A middle-aged man passed me by in a hurry from behind.

LABEL: 0x14DC
STRING: And so, the corridor quickly filled with more and more people.

LABEL: 0x150E
STRING: I didn't realize there were this many people on board...

LABEL: 0x153A
STRING: A bustling crowd of passengers.

LABEL: 0x1562
STRING: I knew there would be about 50 people, but it was much denser than I expected.

LABEL: 0x15A8
STRING: The atmosphere was more like a school corridor than a station platform...

LABEL: 0x15F4
STRING: The well-lit corridor was filling with buzzing enthusiasm.

LABEL: 0x1630
STRING: Even though most of them were older than me, they were as cheerful as if they were still students.

LABEL: 0x1686
STRING: Most of them were ROMLES staff... In other words, marine enthusiasts, so it was not surprising that they were excited.

LABEL: 0x16F2
STRING: Their anticipation was palpable, and their steps were light.

LABEL: 0x1A2F
STRING: By the time I arrived, many people had already gathered in the observation room.

LABEL: 0x1A6D
STRING: The uniformed staff stood out amongst the plain-clothed passengers.

LABEL: 0x1AB9
STRING: They wore a uniform that was unmistakable from a distance, per tourism industry standards.

LABEL: 0x1B13
STRING: Their friendly banter with the passengers was understandable, given the exclusive nature of this event.

LABEL: 0x1B83
STRING: For this voyage, they were both hosts and guests.

LABEL: 0x1BD3
STRING: I passed by a few familiar faces but no one I knew very well.

LABEL: 0x1C35
STRING: Well, that was a good thing in and of itself...

LABEL: 0x1C69
STRING: Karaoke, yakiniku, amusement parks... Always by myself...

LABEL: 0x1C99
STRING: And now, I was alone inside this submarine.

LABEL: 0x1CB3
STRING: I gazed at the large window in boredom, and after a few moments, the entrance to the observation deck opened, and a woman walked in.

LABEL: 0x1D96
STRING: She had a small, childlike body.

LABEL: 0x1DB6
STRING: You could call her slender, but not unbalanced.

LABEL: 0x1DFE
STRING: There was definitely still room for growth.

LABEL: 0x1E3A
STRING: On the other hand, her facial features were quite refined.

LABEL: 0x1E6C
STRING: It was a shame her eyes gave off this tough impression.

LABEL: 0x1EA2
STRING: She had the sharp eyes and posture of a class president.

LABEL: 0x1EE0
STRING: Her uniform looked somehow inappropriate for her height, which made me smile.

LABEL: 0x1F22
STRING: Nearly half of the people present had noticed her and were staring at her.

LABEL: 0x1F64
STRING: As the chatter gradually died down, she stepped up onto a small stage built right in the middle of a large window and bowed to us with her back to it.

LABEL: 0x2068
STRING: 「I wish to thank you all for joining us on this voyage on the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x20BB
STRING: 「My name is Momoi Yukari, and I serve as the chief attendant of this submarine.」

LABEL: 0x2113
STRING: 「As you may have heard in the previous broadcast, this submarine has no captain or any crew members directly at the controls.」

LABEL: 0x218F
STRING: 「That's because we're letting POL, the most advanced AI to date, do the work for us.」

LABEL: 0x21D6
STRING: 「However, POL doesn't have the limbs we do.」

LABEL: 0x2213
STRING: 「I might not look like the most competent person, as you can see... But if you need help with anything, please don't hesitate to call out to me.」

LABEL: 0x2282
STRING: Her voice was so clear that I wondered if it was really coming from that small body.

LABEL: 0x2332
STRING: 「So, as POL just announced, we will hold an introduction to help you enjoy the voyage ahead.」

LABEL: 0x23B3
STRING: 「Let's start with the description of our route, although I'm sure you're all already familiar with it...」

LABEL: 0x241C
STRING: A few laughs rose from here and there.

LABEL: 0x2442
STRING: No wonder since today's passengers were people directly involved with the project.

LABEL: 0x2480
STRING: When it came time to give the explanation, the look on her face changed.

LABEL: 0x252E
STRING: 「Turn your attention toward the large window in front of you, please.」

LABEL: 0x255B
STRING: As soon as Yukari said that, an image was displayed on the window as if it was a large monitor.

LABEL: 0x2646
STRING: A polymer-structured transmissive display.

LABEL: 0x2672
STRING: Generously high-tech.

LABEL: 0x2698
STRING: An audible gasp rose not just from me but from everyone around the deck.

LABEL: 0x26E6
STRING: This was even more luxurious than I thought it would be.

LABEL: 0x2726
STRING: After an intro screen lasting less than ten seconds, a simple round map was displayed.

LABEL: 0x2795
STRING: 「If you look here, you can see Kurama Bay is shaped like a horseshoe with a narrow mouth at the top of the U-shape.」

LABEL: 0x2804
STRING: 「Currently, the <SHEEP III> that carries us is at the bottom of it, in the inner part of the bay.」

LABEL: 0x2859
STRING: 「The sea here is still very shallow, with a depth of 30 to 50 meters at most.」

LABEL: 0x28BB
STRING: 「On the other hand, the upper part of the U, the mouth of the bay, is about 13 kilometers wide from east to west. Around this area, the sea deepens rapidly.」

LABEL: 0x2926
STRING: 「――That's where the so-called "deep sea" is.」

LABEL: 0x2972
STRING: 「We'll first proceed by sea toward the mouth of the bay and then dive from there.」

LABEL: 0x2A92
STRING: 「Well then, everyone. Do you know how deep the deep sea is?」

LABEL: 0x2AE7
STRING: Her tone was forcefully cheerful.

LABEL: 0x2B0F
STRING: Well, everyone here was more or less an expert on the subject.

LABEL: 0x2B55
STRING: It was inevitable that this would turn into a farce at some point.

LABEL: 0x2B8F
STRING: Her question was so obvious that no one dared to raise their hand.

LABEL: 0x2BDF
STRING: Perhaps losing interest as soon as she heard the question, a girl in the crowd wandered toward the windows.

LABEL: 0x2C5F
STRING: Wouldn't ignoring Yukari make her feel terrible?

LABEL: 0x2C9F
STRING: It wouldn't hurt for someone to play along, would it?

LABEL: 0x2CE1
STRING: Circumstances being what they were, I was not able to take on that role...

LABEL: 0x2D57
STRING: One hand rose quickly.

LABEL: 0x2D7D
STRING: I was impressed because I didn't know how someone could raise their hand in this atmosphere.

LABEL: 0x2DE2
STRING: 「Okay, give her a microphone.」

LABEL: 0x2E87
STRING: It was a young girl who stood up after being nominated by Yukari.

LABEL: 0x2ED1
STRING: Was she a high school student?

LABEL: 0x2EEF
STRING: She was a girl who seemed surprisingly cheerful among the adults, who all had a researcher-like aura surrounding them.

LABEL: 0x2F54
STRING: Her irreverent attitude seemed somehow nostalgic.

LABEL: 0x2F94
STRING: Yes, just like...

LABEL: 0x2FDC
STRING: No, no, no.

LABEL: 0x2FFC
STRING: I shook my head to dispel the illusion.

LABEL: 0x302A
STRING: In the meantime, she was invited up to the stage where she received a microphone and, after some thought, answered slowly.

LABEL: 0x3171
STRING: 「Hmm, I think it's...

LABEL: 0x3241
STRING: 1000 meters! ...

LABEL: 0x32C3
STRING: Or maybe not?」

LABEL: 0x32F0
STRING: 「Unfortunately, it's not quite that deep.」

LABEL: 0x332E
STRING: 「What we call the deep sea is where the water is more than 200 meters deep.」

LABEL: 0x33ED
STRING: 「Wow! It's a lot less than I thought!」

LABEL: 0x3420
STRING: Laughter broke out all around me.

LABEL: 0x3444
STRING: How normal to think that 200 meters wasn't deep...

LABEL: 0x347A
STRING: The crowd wasn't ridiculing the girl's ignorance. They were laughing at her honesty.

LABEL: 0x34DC
STRING: A warm atmosphere pervaded the room.

LABEL: 0x353A
STRING: Hmm...

LABEL: 0x3554
STRING: I thought all the passengers were related to the project, but it seemed like that was not the case.

LABEL: 0x35B4
STRING: Maybe she was the daughter of one of the researchers.

LABEL: 0x35F0
STRING: Anyway, a person with her general sensibilities was a precious thing among this group of experts.

LABEL: 0x364C
STRING: Yukari smiled at her and asked the next question.

LABEL: 0x376B
STRING: 「Then... do you know what the temperature is in the deep sea?」

LABEL: 0x382A
STRING: 「Uhh... I have no idea, but at zero degrees, it would freeze...」

LABEL: 0x38E1
STRING: 「...So, about ten degrees?」

LABEL: 0x3912
STRING: 「That was a good line of thinking. Around here, if you go below 200 meters, the temperature will drop to about 4 degrees.」

LABEL: 0x39E2
STRING: 「So cold! Ah, so that's why the diving suits are so thick...」

LABEL: 0x3A67
STRING: The exchange, which seemed like it was staged, elicited another round of laughter.

LABEL: 0x3B7E
STRING: 「But why bother measuring it that deep?」

LABEL: 0x3C20
STRING: 「...I mean, how do you even measure it?」

LABEL: 0x3C65
STRING: 「Good question. But before I answer that, how about one more quiz?」

LABEL: 0x3CC2
STRING: Yukari turned from the girl toward the audience.

LABEL: 0x3D7E
STRING: 「This great sea we're sailing on...」

LABEL: 0x3DBC
STRING: 「This huge volume of water that fills the sea is, in fact, constantly moving.」

LABEL: 0x3E0C
STRING: 「Water chilled in the North Atlantic and Antarctica sinks into the deep sea and heads toward the tropics and subtropics.」

LABEL: 0x3E6E
STRING: 「Water warmed in the tropical and subtropical seas rises to the surface again and travels through the oceans again to the polar regions.」

LABEL: 0x3EDA
STRING: 「That is how the waters of the oceans travel the world.%N

LABEL: 0x3FD4
STRING: Now then, how long do you think it'll take for it to go "around the world"?」

LABEL: 0x40A2
STRING: 「Eh? Another question?」

LABEL: 0x40C2
STRING: 「Hnn... 50 years...?」

LABEL: 0x4152
STRING: 「No, 100 years!」

LABEL: 0x41B6
STRING: This time it was not common knowledge for everyone in the audience.

LABEL: 0x4208
STRING: There was the girl who had gone behind Yukari to look out the windows as if she had lost interest,

LABEL: 0x4262
STRING: and all the adults who had started chatting here and there. They were all quietly waiting for Yukari to continue.

LABEL: 0x42BA
STRING: She looked around at her audience and then slowly opened her mouth.

LABEL: 0x438F
STRING: 「――In fact, it is said to take 2000 years.」

LABEL: 0x43C1
STRING: 「But of course, we haven't been tracing the waters of the sea for 2000 years.」

LABEL: 0x4419
STRING: 「How do you measure the speed at which water moves in the sea?」

LABEL: 0x445D
STRING: 「To tell you the truth, the same system is used here to measure the temperature of the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x44E7
STRING: Yukari began to talk eloquently.

LABEL: 0x450B
STRING: Perhaps this wasn't the content they had planned since the subject wasn't for the general public.

LABEL: 0x4633
STRING: The girl on stage listened intently to Yukari's words, tilting her head at the occasional jargon.

LABEL: 0x468F
STRING: It was like master and pupil, or teacher and student.

LABEL: 0x474A
STRING: I turned my head away from the stage, almost yawning.

LABEL: 0x478E
STRING: At that time.

LABEL: 0x482A
STRING: As I turned around, I saw a girl who looked out of place.

LABEL: 0x4882
STRING: She looked even younger than the girl on stage.

LABEL: 0x48E4
STRING: She looked toward the stage with a kind, almost nostalgic look in her eyes.

LABEL: 0x4950
STRING: She had pale skin and was wearing white clothes.

LABEL: 0x4972
STRING: Her clothes might be plain, but they were unique enough that I wanted to call them an outfit.

LABEL: 0x49CA
STRING: All in all, she was a lightly-colored girl.

LABEL: 0x49F2
STRING: She had a fragile quality to her, like she was about to disappear at any moment.

LABEL: 0x4A2A
STRING: You could say she was underdeveloped if you wanted to be mean or had a delicate figure if you put it nicely.

LABEL: 0x4A62
STRING: Although she seemed comfortable in her fluffy, princess-like clothing, her complexion didn't look that good.

LABEL: 0x4ABE
STRING: The soft smile on her face made her look like a Western doll.

LABEL: 0x4B10
STRING: She was the complete opposite of the lively girl on stage, but they seemed to be about the same age.

LABEL: 0x4B9B
STRING: Still, I wondered how she got on this boat.

LABEL: 0x4BE1
STRING: Not to be rude, but she didn't look like someone involved with the project.

LABEL: 0x4C2F
STRING: Although there were rumors that a girl genius would be boarding, I didn't think this was "her," either.

LABEL: 0x4C9B
STRING: You couldn't get these tickets by chance.

LABEL: 0x4CCF
STRING: In fact, getting a ticket was the hardest part of the plan for me.

LABEL: 0x4D8D
STRING: And then, the girl looked back at me.

LABEL: 0x4DB7
STRING: 「Ah.」

LABEL: 0x4DCB
STRING: I found myself staring at her, and our eyes met awkwardly.

LABEL: 0x4E17
STRING: The girl smiled at me as I was frozen, unable to look away.

LABEL: 0x4E6F
STRING: Was I overly self-conscious, or did she mistake me for someone else? I looked around forcibly.

LABEL: 0x4EBD
STRING: The girl giggled.

LABEL: 0x4EDF
STRING: She quickly turned toward me.

LABEL: 0x4F0D
STRING: This girl with a unique aura, combined with her pure white clothes, was approaching me leisurely.

LABEL: 0x4FD9
STRING: She stopped me before I could escape like a snake staring down her prey.

LABEL: 0x5072
STRING: The girl bowed deeply.

LABEL: 0x511A
STRING: 「Hello. Do you happen to know my sister?」

LABEL: 0x5157
STRING: 「Huh? Your sister?」

LABEL: 0x51F2
STRING: 「Look, over there, the cheerful one――」

LABEL: 0x5231
STRING: She nodded her head.

LABEL: 0x5251
STRING: I think she meant that lively girl talking with that attendant.

LABEL: 0x530C
STRING: 「That's my sister right there.」

LABEL: 0x53D8
STRING: 「As I thought, you must be a friend of hers!」

LABEL: 0x5416
STRING: 「――And such a cool guy, too.」

LABEL: 0x549E
STRING: She looked at me for a moment, then nodded her head.

LABEL: 0x54E3
STRING: The girl, who spoke in a low voice to not disturb the exchange on stage, seemed somewhat proud of herself.

LABEL: 0x5543
STRING: She must be happy to have everyone's attention focused on her sister.

LABEL: 0x5581
STRING: But were they really sisters? They didn't look alike that much if you asked me...

LABEL: 0x55F1
STRING: Anyway, it was unexpected that there was someone who would talk to me here.

LABEL: 0x565A
STRING: I glanced sideways around me.

LABEL: 0x5682
STRING: Although most eyes focused on the stage, the out-of-place girl was attracting some attention.

LABEL: 0x56E2
STRING: If we continued like this, people might start wondering what our relationship was.

LABEL: 0x573C
STRING: ――I quickly smiled back at her, as eloquently as possible.

LABEL: 0x57E8
STRING: 「No, it's... Look, I'm not a friend of hers.」

LABEL: 0x583A
STRING: 「She just stood out and... caught my eye.」

LABEL: 0x587A
STRING: 「Sorry to give you the wrong idea.」

LABEL: 0x58D3
STRING: 「Ah, no... If you're not, then that's alright.」

LABEL: 0x590B
STRING: 「Sorry for speaking to you out of the blue.」

LABEL: 0x594C
STRING: She looked apologetic and embarrassed.

LABEL: 0x5978
STRING: Her shrinking figure made her look even younger than she was.

LABEL: 0x59B6
STRING: All the more strange that she was in this submarine among all these involved people.

LABEL: 0x5A0C
STRING: ...I didn't want to prolong this line of conversation.

LABEL: 0x5A38
STRING: As if to break the deadlock, I asked her a question.

LABEL: 0x5A8A
STRING: 「By the way, you're...?」

LABEL: 0x5ABD
STRING: 「Hikari.

LABEL: 0x5B47
STRING: You can call me Lumiere=Hikari.」

LABEL: 0x5B8A
STRING: 「And how... Excuse me?」

LABEL: 0x5BA6
STRING: "And how did you come to be on this boat?"

LABEL: 0x5BD0
STRING: That was what I meant to ask, but her introduction cut my thoughts short.

LABEL: 0x5C14
STRING: 「Lumi... What did you say?」

LABEL: 0x5CB7
STRING: 「Lumiere=Hikari. It's my pen name.」

LABEL: 0x5DB0
STRING: 「I'm actually a poet, you see?」

LABEL: 0x5DFE
STRING: I replied absentmindedly... But what else could I say?

LABEL: 0x5E44
STRING: The girl puffed out her chest in pride, even more than a moment ago.

LABEL: 0x5E78
STRING: She declared herself a poet and gave her pen name on our first meeting?

LABEL: 0x5EB0
STRING: ...This kid was more troublesome than I expected――

LABEL: 0x5F6D
STRING: 「Ah, mister!」

LABEL: 0x5F8B
STRING: 「You just thought that I was troublesome, didn't you?」

LABEL: 0x5FCA
STRING: ――She was sharp.

LABEL: 0x5FE6
STRING: I didn't let my inner thoughts get in the way of my smile.

LABEL: 0x602C
STRING: 「Well you see――」

LABEL: 0x610C
STRING: 「Hmm? Hmmmmm...?」

LABEL: 0x613C
STRING: The girl smiled mischievously and pointed her finger at me.

LABEL: 0x61F5
STRING: 「Well, well, well. Your face tells me I hit the nail on the head.」

LABEL: 0x6227
STRING: 「You're awful, mister...」

LABEL: 0x62B9
STRING: 「But... I forgive you!」

LABEL: 0x62E8
STRING: This kid wouldn't listen at all, would she?

LABEL: 0x6318
STRING: This girl, Hikari, was more than just troublesome.

LABEL: 0x6356
STRING: She was trouble itself.

LABEL: 0x6374
STRING: It was a mistake to get involved with her.

LABEL: 0x63E5
STRING: It was hopeless... I let out a sigh and slumped my shoulders.

LABEL: 0x6417
STRING: Then, Hikari let out a giggle.

LABEL: 0x6445
STRING: 「What is it now?」

LABEL: 0x6469
STRING: Without even trying to hide my annoyance, I asked her.

LABEL: 0x64AF
STRING: Anyone looking could see that I was pretty annoyed.

LABEL: 0x655F
STRING: However, even after seeing that, she smiled happily.

LABEL: 0x65A7
STRING: 「Is something funny?」

LABEL: 0x664A
STRING: 「Weeelll...」

LABEL: 0x6666
STRING: 「I'm just happy that you finally dropped your mask.」

LABEL: 0x66AD
STRING: 「Mask?」

LABEL: 0x6740
STRING: 「Yea, your mask.」

LABEL: 0x6765
STRING: When I asked her, she nodded her head repeatedly.

LABEL: 0x6818
STRING: 「We all wear masks to protect ourselves and our true feelings.」

LABEL: 0x6866
STRING: 「But if you wear your mask too tightly, you might suffocate your heart.」

LABEL: 0x68C1
STRING: 「What are you getting at...?」

LABEL: 0x68EE
STRING: 「You were suffocating, mister.」

LABEL: 0x6966
STRING: Wearing a mask to the point of suffocating, huh...?

LABEL: 0x699C
STRING: It was like she saw right through me.

LABEL: 0x69D8
STRING: But strangely, it didn't feel bad.

LABEL: 0x6A06
STRING: Was it because I couldn't deny her words?

LABEL: 0x6A48
STRING: No, it wasn't just that.

LABEL: 0x6A74
STRING: I thought she was just a weird kid who couldn't read the air, but――

LABEL: 0x6B23
STRING: 「Hmm?」

LABEL: 0x6B3F
STRING: 「Did your opinion of me rise a bit by any chance, mister?」

LABEL: 0x6BE9
STRING: 「I'm a bit embarrassed... Ehehe‾」

LABEL: 0x6C2E
STRING: Nope, she was a weird girl, after all.

LABEL: 0x6C5E
STRING: The girl smiled shyly, not hearing my reply at all.

LABEL: 0x6C9E
STRING: A strange kid...

LABEL: 0x6CB6
STRING: But the vulnerable smile on her face disarmed me.

LABEL: 0x6D2B
STRING: ――I shook my head from side to side to clear my mind.

LABEL: 0x6D63

LABEL: 0x13289
STRING: 「Silence!」

LABEL: 0x132A3
STRING: 「Try not to move, please!」

LABEL: 0x132CF
STRING: It was Misasagi's voice.

LABEL: 0x132E7
STRING: But his voice was quickly drowned out by the noise rising from the crowd.

LABEL: 0x13345
STRING: 「Does anyone have any light sources?!」

LABEL: 0x1337B
STRING: 「All electronics should've been left at the port!」

LABEL: 0x133AD
STRING: 「Never mind that, are we sure we're safe here?!」

LABEL: 0x133E1
STRING: The people were talking and shouting anxiously.

LABEL: 0x13411
STRING: Their anxiety transformed into anger, and the calm atmosphere from before was destroyed by their rising voices.

LABEL: 0x13453
STRING: Eventually, everyone's voices started to overlap into a single mess.

LABEL: 0x13499
STRING: 「Everyone, please be quiet!」

LABEL: 0x134CB
STRING: Again, a loud voice resounded.

LABEL: 0x134F9
STRING: 「I'm getting confirmation now, so please stand by!」

LABEL: 0x1353D
STRING: 「――Don't worry, everyone's going to be fine.」

LABEL: 0x1356B
STRING: One by one, the voices stopped, and the people soon fell silent in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x135B9
STRING: Silence.

LABEL: 0x135CD
STRING: True darkness at the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x135F5
STRING: There was no light coming through the windows.

LABEL: 0x1361D
STRING: You couldn't fight it. You couldn't run from it...

LABEL: 0x13651
STRING: Still, as I got used to my faint vision, my body's senses returned.

LABEL: 0x1368F
STRING: The crew was standing in front of the doorway, ready for a potential riot.

LABEL: 0x136D3
STRING: But the passengers couldn't move in this darkness, even if they wanted to...

LABEL: 0x13713
STRING: The observation deck was silent.

LABEL: 0x13735
STRING: There was an unpleasant sense of frustration swirling around me, different from the tense feeling of anticipation I had felt earlier.

LABEL: 0x1379F
STRING: The anxiety stagnated and settled down.

LABEL: 0x137C3
STRING: People could only look out the windows as if imploring the world beyond them.

LABEL: 0x13807
STRING: Behind the thick glass, micro-organisms continued to emit light, as if to mock the passengers――

LABEL: 0x138BB
STRING: 5 minutes passed, then ten.

LABEL: 0x138E2
STRING: There was no change in the situation, and the power outage showed no signs of recovery.

LABEL: 0x1391C
STRING: A stagnant space, as if time had stopped.

LABEL: 0x1395A
STRING: All the while, people were looking for a change in the situation.

LABEL: 0x1398A
STRING: ――Their mutterings echoed clearly in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x139CC
STRING: 「Hey, this submarine...

LABEL: 0x139EB
STRING: Is it sinking?」

LABEL: 0x13A0F
STRING: The words that came out of no one's mouth in particular inside the observation deck were quiet.

LABEL: 0x13A61
STRING: While diving, there was no shaking or noise... A selling point for the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x13AC6
STRING: That was true even now...

LABEL: 0x13B10
STRING: The people who were looking out the windows seemed to have noticed something.

LABEL: 0x13B46
STRING: With a small murmur, they pointed out the window.

LABEL: 0x13B7C
STRING: What their fingers were pointing at was...

LABEL: 0x13B94
STRING: The light that had been flickering outside the windows for a while now,

LABEL: 0x13BC2
STRING: "Was rising upward."

LABEL: 0x13BE8
STRING: Falling through the night sky――

LABEL: 0x13C12
STRING: 「What's the meaning of this?!」

LABEL: 0x13C38
STRING: 「Hey, you better explain that to us!」

LABEL: 0x13C64
STRING: People were leaving their seats one by one in response to the unbelievable situation.

LABEL: 0x13C98
STRING: Anxiety became fear.

LABEL: 0x13CB4
STRING: Fear became anger.

LABEL: 0x13CD0
STRING: Anger became hate.

LABEL: 0x13CEE
STRING: Hatred became distress.

LABEL: 0x13D0C
STRING: The people in unbearable distress became a torrent or a wave.

LABEL: 0x13D56
STRING: In the darkness, that swirling and turbulent cascade wouldn't stop.

LABEL: 0x13D88
STRING: 「Please don't move! It's dangerous!」

LABEL: 0x13DB6
STRING: The crew blocking the doorway to the observation deck raised their voices.

LABEL: 0x13DF2
STRING: Confused people crowded around them, struggling against each other.

LABEL: 0x13E32
STRING: The crew members struggled to control them, but their faces were also somewhat pale.

LABEL: 0x13E7C
STRING: It was no wonder―they were also worried about not knowing what'd happen next.

LABEL: 0x13EC6
STRING: 「Agh!」

LABEL: 0x13EDE
STRING: My sympathy for the crew was short-lived.

LABEL: 0x13F08
STRING: The doorway opened, and someone entered.

LABEL: 0x13F3A
STRING: Eventually, the figure came right up to me, staggered, and grabbed me by the right shoulder.

LABEL: 0x13F90
STRING: 「Excuse me.」

LABEL: 0x13FC8
STRING: It was Misasagi.

LABEL: 0x13FEA
STRING: What was he... doing?

LABEL: 0x14020
STRING: He didn't pay any attention to me though, and as soon as he regained his bearings, he let go of my shoulder and stepped into the space between the passengers.

LABEL: 0x1408E
STRING: It was as if he was single-mindedly searching for something.

LABEL: 0x140C4
STRING: His somewhat mysterious figure was unpleasantly eye-catching in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x1411C
STRING: If I listened carefully, I could hear him whispering and muttering something to himself.

LABEL: 0x1417A
STRING: 「I've got to find <Alice>...」

LABEL: 0x141AC
STRING: 「<Alice>...」

LABEL: 0x141CE
STRING: ...Alice?

LABEL: 0x141E8
STRING: Alice... Lewis Carroll?

LABEL: 0x14218
STRING: A blonde girl in an apron-style dress flashed through my mind.

LABEL: 0x14258
STRING: But what's with that metaphor in the middle of the sea?

LABEL: 0x14296
STRING: Misasagi pushed through the crowd, muttering those words in a raspy voice.

LABEL: 0x142E6
STRING: ...Should I go after him?

LABEL: 0x1430E
STRING: I hesitated for a moment.

LABEL: 0x14328
STRING: However, now was not the time.

LABEL: 0x14354
STRING: Remember your true goal.

LABEL: 0x1437E
STRING: ――This chaos was an opportunity.

LABEL: 0x143A8
STRING: I couldn't miss it.

LABEL: 0x143CC
STRING: Some time has passed after the blackout, the passengers' doubts and anxieties were already reaching critical mass.

LABEL: 0x14422
STRING: Struggling, grasping, and panicking crowds.

LABEL: 0x1445A
STRING: Inside the observation deck, the thoughts of the many reverberated and amplified each other, giving birth to even more chaos.

LABEL: 0x144A8
STRING: It was like hell.

LABEL: 0x144C4
STRING: 「...This is a problem.」

LABEL: 0x144E6
STRING: I took a deep breath and slowly opened my eyes as I stood at the side of the observation deck, avoiding the crowds.

LABEL: 0x14670
STRING: ――Well then.

LABEL: 0x14688
STRING: It was time to get moving.

LABEL: 0x146AA
STRING: First, I had to cross over to the front section...

LABEL: 0x146E8
STRING: I looked at the two doors in the observation deck, one on each side.

LABEL: 0x14722
STRING: Both were at the center of the chaos... Well, that was understandable.

LABEL: 0x14762
STRING: If I tried to force my way through the door now, others were bound to follow.

LABEL: 0x147BE
STRING: That would be a problem... If it turned into a riot, it would interfere with my plans.

LABEL: 0x14818
STRING: So, what do I do now?

LABEL: 0x14840
STRING: 「Hey, are the lights still not back yet?!」

LABEL: 0x1486E
STRING: Someone in the crowd near the door grabbed an attendant by his side.

LABEL: 0x148C0
STRING: 「How long are you going to keep us in here?!」

LABEL: 0x148FA
STRING: 「You're hiding something!」

LABEL: 0x14928
STRING: With his words, the commotion intensified.

LABEL: 0x1495A
STRING: ...I turned my attention away from the commotion and looked at a dark spot near the center of the observation deck.

LABEL: 0x149B8
STRING: There was a stairway that no one seemed to have noticed in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x14A04
STRING: I looked around, made sure no one was watching, and quietly, quickly, approached the side of the stairs.

LABEL: 0x14A6A
STRING: Most people were distracted by the ongoing unrest.

LABEL: 0x14AB2
STRING: ――Now should be a good time.

LABEL: 0x14AD2
STRING: I walked down the spiral staircase leading to the lower floor.

LABEL: 0x14B6C
STRING: I tried to keep my footsteps as quiet as possible while checking my footing.

LABEL: 0x14BCA
STRING: I continued through the darkness that grew deeper and deeper.

LABEL: 0x14BF6
STRING: And so, I arrived at the bottom of the pitch-black darkness.

LABEL: 0x14C28
STRING: 「...Is this all right?」

LABEL: 0x14C4A
STRING: I didn't expect a response.

LABEL: 0x14C74
STRING: I was asking myself.

LABEL: 0x14C8C
STRING: It seemed like even POL hadn't heard me.

LABEL: 0x14D16
STRING: I ran down to the second floor of the ship without hesitation.

LABEL: 0x14D4A
STRING: The second floor of the rear section, which meant down here was... the floor where my room was.

LABEL: 0x14E1B
STRING: 「Whoa!」

LABEL: 0x14E35
STRING: There was a sudden shock.

LABEL: 0x14E4F
STRING: I held onto the handrail of the spiral staircase as I lost my footing and was able to balance myself.

LABEL: 0x14E9F
STRING: But... what was that about?

LABEL: 0x14EC7
STRING: I hadn't been the least bit fazed by the darkness, but now confusion hit me.

LABEL: 0x14EFF
STRING: 「Aaaah!!」

LABEL: 0x14F1D
STRING: There was a scream from the observation deck.

LABEL: 0x14F3D
STRING: I wasn't sure what they were screaming about, but I couldn't believe it reached this far...

LABEL: 0x14F8D
STRING: A series of shouts and the voices of several crew members followed.

LABEL: 0x14FCF
STRING: The screams showed no signs of stopping.

LABEL: 0x14FF9
STRING: Hey... This wasn't part of the plan.

LABEL: 0x15025
STRING: What the hell was going on?

LABEL: 0x1504B
STRING: No, that wasn't the point.

LABEL: 0x1506F
STRING: 「A-Anyway, I need to get to the bridge...」

LABEL: 0x150A9
STRING: My destination was the front section.

LABEL: 0x150C9
STRING: A bridge that connected to the front section was located on the first, second, and third floors, respectively.

LABEL: 0x15113
STRING: I walked along the wall in the darkness in order to reach its entrance.

LABEL: 0x151FB
STRING: 「Whooaaa!」

LABEL: 0x15219
STRING: At that moment, the floor tilted upward like a slide.

LABEL: 0x1525F
STRING: Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!

LABEL: 0x15287
STRING: I couldn't stand, so I dropped to my knees and slid slowly across the floor.

LABEL: 0x152D9
STRING: Oh my God―what was happening?!

LABEL: 0x1530B
STRING: I didn't understand.

LABEL: 0x1532B
STRING: There was nothing I could do.

LABEL: 0x1534F
STRING: All I could do was resign myself to this situation――

LABEL: 0x1538D
STRING: ――No, doing that wouldn't solve anything.

LABEL: 0x153C7
STRING: This wasn't the time...!

LABEL: 0x15474
STRING: 「Uwaaah!」

LABEL: 0x15490
STRING: There was a booming and heavy sound that shook my insides.

LABEL: 0x154B8
STRING: What... What was it now?

LABEL: 0x154DE
STRING: I sat down and prepared for the possible danger.

LABEL: 0x1550E
STRING: ...Nothing was happening...?

LABEL: 0x15532
STRING: No, that was wrong.

LABEL: 0x1554C
STRING: After a while, the tilting of the ship gradually subsided, and the floor became closer to horizontal.

LABEL: 0x15598
STRING: Okay, good, stay just like that...

LABEL: 0x1563D
STRING: 「Aaaaaaah!!!」

LABEL: 0x15667
STRING: The <SHEEP III> was hit by a shocking sound and shaking that was incomparable to before.

LABEL: 0x156AC
STRING: I would've let out a scream, but it would've been drowned out by the sound of the impact reverberating through the ship.

LABEL: 0x15702
STRING: I lost my grip on the railing and fell down.

LABEL: 0x15740
STRING: Even my consciousness was shaken.

LABEL: 0x15766
STRING: Where, why, and what was I doing...?!

LABEL: 0x15798
STRING: The constant vibrations and tremors didn't seem to stop.

LABEL: 0x157EE
STRING: I rolled up my body and tumbled into the bridge.

LABEL: 0x15826
STRING: I hit my body a few times in the darkness, and I couldn't even tell if it was the wall or the floor.

LABEL: 0x15880
STRING: 「Argh!」

LABEL: 0x1589A
STRING: I hit my head hard against something, and suddenly all the strength drained from my body.

LABEL: 0x158E8
STRING: I lay there, my vision blank.

LABEL: 0x15916
STRING: In the stagnant darkness, I started to feel faint――

LABEL: 0x1595C
STRING: ――Shit!

LABEL: 0x15976
STRING: I couldn't just give up like this!

LABEL: 0x159B8
STRING: I desperately reached out.

LABEL: 0x159D8
STRING: My consciousness was fading.

LABEL: 0x159F2
STRING: At the last moment, as I was lying there, I could hear a roaring sound approaching the floor I was on――
